entry.title: And I will search for you (in every home I've ever made)
entry.summary:
Author: thenyoumightaswellwrestleangels

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,453Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: "You can put some music on if you want," you say easily, and Jason thinks for a moment that maybe you haven't noticed - maybe you haven't caught on to the way he hovers in the doorway, like he's not sure how much of this is real, or how much of it is deserved.But then he blinks at you, and there's something kind and patient in your gaze that makes him want to fall to his knees and pray.

entry.title: Cracks in the Armor
entry.summary:
Author: arkham_bunniii

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,659Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 65

Summary: You were a former GCPD detective who left the force after Gotham’s corruption pushed you too far. Now, you work in the gray area of Gotham’s underworld—tracking weapons, gathering intel, and occasionally taking down the scum that even the Bat can’t reach.When the Arkham Knight arrives, he doesn’t just tear through Gotham… he takes it over in a single night. Every time you cross paths, it’s the same: a dangerous game of cat and mouse.You’re enemies. You should be enemies. But every fight, every standoff, pulls you closer, and something tells you there’s more to this soldier than the armor he wears.All your begging to ask is, what’s really beneath that helmet?

entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,633Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 458

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner―you can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.

entry.title: Love, Vega.
entry.summary:
Author: dancingqunn

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,696Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 10

Summary: After months away from the paradisiacal island of Vega, you return for one of the most anticipated events of the year: your best friend Kory's wedding. Amid laughter, warm hugs, and landscapes that spark nostalgia, the island isn’t the only place holding deep memories.As you dive into wedding preparations and reunite with old friends, you find yourself face-to-face with Jason, someone who once meant more than he should have. Between parties filled with music and dancing under the stars, the romantic atmosphere and unresolved tensions make you question whether you're truly ready to leave the past behind and give what you once had a second chance.

entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,021Chapters: 6/25Kudos: 53

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: Of Things Red and Undead
entry.summary:
Author: Bat_brat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 147,751Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 880

Summary: After his time as the Arkham Knight and the events that followed, Jason Todd is on a journey for redemption. He was trying, anyway, until you came along. You’re no stranger to the shadows that lurk in Gotham’s undertow, but one fateful night, everything is turned upside down and suddenly nothing, nowhere, and no one is safe. Gotham is used to this though right? How much trouble could you possibly be? Especially when a vigilante with anger issues, trauma, and a plethora of guns makes it his personal mission to find out exactly what you are.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 679,625Chapters: 93/?Kudos: 478

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol
